content.detailedDescription:
My wife told me this morning that she and my son saw a ufo from my son's bedroom window at 6:00 am this morning.  luckily my wife saw it as well or we might have chalked it up as our sons imagination as we were watching ufo hunters last night.  their accounts are a little different but my wife's eyes aren't what they used to be without her glasses.  
my son's account: he says he woke up, go out of bed and was looking out his window as always does.  he saw a light in the sky (looking outhis window would be facing approximately 27 degrees south east.  my son says he saw it and new it couldn't be a plane or a helicopter.  it was bright and sitting still and pulsating. he says it's shape was like an ear plug.  the best we could get out him is that looked mostly like along upside down bell.  he says he saw it turn red once and saw light or something shoot out it's sides (whereas) my wife didn't see something shoot out the sides.
then it slowly lowered down a bit from watching my wife's finger movement, i am guessing maybe 1,000 - 2,000 feet. and then slowly went back up into the sky and behind the clouds.

my wife's account: she saw it when my son pointed it out.  she says it looked like a bright shimmering star.  she says it was too bright and pulsated way too much to be a star.  then her account is the same of it dropping down slowly, then rising back up and ddisappearing behind the clouds.

if it's any help, two nights before, about 12:30 am, i was out side smoking a cigarette and noticed a star i haven't noticed before (i watch and study the star movements almost every night) to the east.  it was the lowest start in the sky.  i noticed it becasue if its brilliance.  it was about the brightest start in the sky yet no where near the biggest. it was pulsating red, green, blue just like a star does.  however, i have never seen a star with colors that noticeable before.  i watched it for a good 10 minutes and it never moved.  i figured it was a star but noted where it was and decided to check out it's location the next night (last night).  last night i went out at 11:30 pm and i saw nothing like the night before.  i did see a very very small, dull, almost not visible star in around the same location.  was it the smae star? i don't think so but maybe?  the difference between the two nights and the object in question was definitely two different things to me.

over the last few months, during the days, i have been seeing things in the sky that i can't classify as airplanes.  i can't say exactly what i have been witnessing, but the events are striking me as something other than typical aircraft and typical aircraft behavior.  if you want specifics on these efvents, i can get more specific.

thank you for your time,

wife: 42
son: 9

brent dougherty
content.summary: Viewed from bedroom window by wife and son

content.detailedDescription: I was driving from mineral wells to comanche texas on hwy 16 south. i was approx. 3.5 miles north of deleon texas when a huge pbject appeared in the dark night sky. it was hard to tell the size and exact shape because it did not las long, it was probably 2-3 football field lenghts in size and had 3-5 bright oragne lights that were appox.  the size of a bus that rotated from left to right and was followed up by a bluish or greenish light then disappeared. i pulled over when i saw this and told the person that i was on the phone with that i had to go becasue i saw something weird and wanted o concentrate on what this was. i watched it for a long time after it disappeared and all that i could see was two bluish or greenish light that were about 1-2 football field lengths apart that moved across the horizon at very fast speeds up and down unlike any movement seen in the sky before. i decided to start driving again because it never reappeared and i felt stupid sitting there thinking about what i saw. not sure what it was and can not believe that i am even reporting such a thing but, figured what the heck, this might be something that could help out.
content.summary: 3-5 bright orange lights appeared then dissappeared

content.detailedDescription:
We were actually setup for taking pictures of these, since they have been happening almost every night for the past week.

we saw many strange lights moving at incredible speeds through he sky. none of them made a sound, and as you will see from the pics, some are the same as the stephenville ufo, and some new interesting shapes etc.

at first we were a little freaked out, because we knew that these were not planes, they are easily identified and clearly unmistakable.

they moved very quickly and erratic. jumping miles at a time across the sky, sometimes they would stop, then move at a hi rate of speed and even split into multiple objects.

the pictures were taken with a nikon 30d at 1600 iso raw image format with a  f/4-5.6 70x300mm image stabilizing telephoto lens.

i took over 200 photos, but this is the range i felt best represented what we saw.
content.summary: Strange objects, lights and fireball orbs flashing through sky at incredible speed.

content.detailedDescription:
I have never really believe in ufos before, and i���m not even sure what i saw. this is what i can tell you:

at about 7:50 pm, my friend and i went outside to smoke a cigarette. we were looking at an unusually bright star, concluding that it was probably a planet. we were discussing what planet it might be when i looked above it and saw a flashing light. i thought it must have been an airplane, but when i looked a bit higher, i saw two more. what was very strange is that none of the blinking lights were moving. they were very far away, so i couldn���t tell for sure if they were just moving very slowly. then, the highest one started to rise upwards, and we realize that it was coming towards us. we watched, and the weirdest part is that it was completely silent. there is a small-craft airport in town, and we are used to hearing planes. this object made no noise at all.

it kept moving towards us until it was finally above us and then past us. we looked up and noticed that it was shaped like a triangle with a light blinking on each end, one light red. i thought they might be government planes since palin was in bowling green today. but they were so close together that it just seemed off. the one traveling above us kept going, silently. we looked back to the other two- one was gone, the other (the lowest one, the first i saw) was still in the same spot. 

we kept watching the moving one and then the third reappeared (or a fourth appeared, i can���t be sure) coming from a completely new direction. they were less than an inch away (from where i stood, it looked this way), slowed down a bit, and then kept traveling on. 

we watched for 4-5 minutes.

i went inside to turn on the news and fire up my computer, but of course nothing was mentioned. i have never looked up anything online about ufos before, and this was the first site i came across. 

i went back outside about 3 minutes after i stopped watching- the first object that i saw was gone, the one that moved over us was very far into the distance, and the third was also gone.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I saw three triangle shaped objects, with lights on each point, traveling and hovering in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Ref. www.Kxan.Com 

http://www.Kxan.Com/dpp/news/strange/ufo_sighting_in_austin 

ufo sighting in austin
video taken of strange lights in the
sky
last edited: monday, 27 oct 2008, 6:36 pm cdt
created on: monday, 27 oct 2008, 12:09 pm cdt

mary lee 
blair shiff
austin (kxan) - two austinites believe they saw a ufo flying over austin in october. they said they have the videotape to prove it. carl lancaster and doug mccullough were both outside their apartments in central austin on middle fiskville road oct. 8 around 9 p.M. when they both saw three bright lights. lancaster said he saw a red light and two white lights that flew in a zigzag pattern across the sky. 
"it was just incredible and just unexplainable," said lancaster. "the lights flew on top of each other and then side by side." 
mccullough captured the mysterious lights on his home video camera. 
"we've got proof," said mccullough. "it's great to finally capture something on video." 
lancaster started waving at the lights, and he said they responded to him by flying on top of each other and then side by side. 
"it was a ufo," said lancaster. "e.T. probably!" 
torvald hessel, austin planetarium's executive director, closely examined lancaster and mccullough's video. he pointed out the lights made a zigzag pattern across the power poles. 
"shooting star, meteorite," said hessel. "it's possible, but i wouldn't be able to explain the zigzag movement." 
hessel watched the video twice and even watched it frame by frame to examine what looked like two lights on top of each other. he said the lights could have been from an airplane or helicopter, although he said that was unlikely. 
"it's obviously two lights, which is interesting," said hessel. "no idea what it is, probably not aliens over austin." 
just recently in stephenville, texas, high school student andy monrreal was hanging out with friends when he also recorded what looked like a ufo. 
"you could see the oval shape," said monrreal. "got my friend, i said 'dude, you got to come look at this.'" 
meanwhile, austin bergstrom international airport officials said they had no reports of any mysterious objects flying over the city the night lancaster and mccullough saw their ufos, but lancaster and mccullough said they have all the proof they need. 
"when i see one, i'll believe it," said lancaster. "i saw not one, not two, but possibly three that night."
content.summary: Ufo sighting in austin

content.detailedDescription: I received a call from my mom telling me that the ufo was back again tonight.  my daughter and i decided to get in my car and head to stephenville to see what we could see.  as soon as we turned onto 377 west, we saw a light moving towards the west.  every now and again, the object would zoom back and forth and you could see three lights below the white lights when this occurred.  we followed it all the way to stephenville. it then proceeded to head west towards the dublin area. we did not follow it after we arrived in stephenville. my daughter and i could not believe what we saw.  i have never seen anything like this before.
content.summary: We saw a white light moving from east to west on 377 going towards stephenville

content.detailedDescription: On the night of june 26, 2002 at 9:00 p.M., i was working security at a construction site in southport, nc.  i know the exact date as this was my mom���s birthday and i am sure of the time because i had just gotten off of the phone with my wife when i noticed a bright orange glow about the size of a basketball due south from my location over the cape fear river.  this object was visible for approx. 45 seconds to a minute.  i didn���t think too much about it at this time as i did not see it when it first became visible as i just looked up & it was there.  i watched the object until it just disappeared.  it did not move away, it just disappeared as if someone had cut off a light switch. approx. 5 minutes later, i was watching in the general direction as where i first saw the object, just as if someone had turned a switch back on, this time i saw it as it appeared.  the wind was blowing and the object did not move or sway at all as it would if it were a flare.  i am at the point where the cape fear river meets the atlantic ocean, so to be sure it was not a boat in trouble, i went upon a tug boat that was moored at my location and climbed the ladder to the top wheel house as to have an unobstructed view of the river and the surrounding area, during this time the sphere is still visible and again not moving or making any sound.  as i watched the object, it split into two (2) more spheres for a total of three now visible.  i was watching as the two other objects became visible and at no time did i see sparks or a tail as is present when a flare is fired.  in fact, there were no boats present during this sighting, as i had a clear view of the entire area.  again the objects were visible for about 5 minutes, then again, they just disappeared.  this went on until about 11:00 p.M.  since this first sighting, i have observed these objects at least 20 different times, never in the same place as they always appear in a different place over the river.  sometimes low, sometimes high in the sky.  i did at one time have a night vision scope with me & observed these objects through the scope & at no time did the scope pick up a heat signal as would be present if the object gave off heat as with a flare.  i have observed these objects as close as 50 yards, and as far away as a mile.  i have observed these objects on clear nights with stars present, & i have seen them on cloudy nights.  i have observed them on calm nights as well as very windy nights, but never on a rainy night. i have observed these object by myself, as well as with other witnesses.  all the people that were present will tell you the same story as i have related to you.  i have myself observed swamp gas & have fired flares, these were neither.  i have several telescopes & am familiar with the stars & planets, again these objects are neither.  the last time that i observed these objects was in june of 2008.  this was the last time that i was near the river at night.  if you would like to interview me or any of the other witnesses, i am a retired police officer and i am available most anytime.  we even can have access to the very places that i have observed these objects.  as i have stated, i am a retired police officer & everything i have told you is the truth & i would even be willing to take any test that you deem necessary to validate what i have related to you.
content.summary: Bright orange light that multiplied into 3 separate spheres

content.detailedDescription:
I have a landscape co. i always look outside to sky, to check the weather.
 this day i looked  though the door window and out of nowhere this saucer 
a peered, just above the trees. i was looking  south. it would be maybe 1/8-
1/4  mile away. near i75 & adams n/b. it zaged left & then right in a southern direction. and it was gone, just like that! i thought it was prety
amazing. then a couple of days after that a man on local news reported a sighting, in bloomfield, mi.
content.summary: Dark gray small saucer shape

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were leaving home to drive to deleon, tx (about 16 miles from our home) where we had seen the ufo's the previous night (tuesday, october 27, 2008).  as i approached the passenger side of our truck i looked south to see bright white lights.  they appeared to be blinking on and off and with each blink they appeared to zoom up and down and from side to side.  the blinks looked some like a code.  when a plane appeared they blinked another signal and disappeared.  the night before at deleon they put on a spectacular show which scared my daughter's dogs and cats as well as my granddaughter (10 years old). on the 27,2008 it was my young granddaughter who came running to her mother's shop telling her there was something strange going on in the sky just south of her home.  my daughter, granddaughter, my daughter's husband, and my husband all witnessed the show.  both my daughter's husband and my husband seemed to think it was a plane but all was silent until a plane suddenly appeared from the west headed toward the east.  it was then that the ufo's made some final blinks and simply disappeared.  that was not unlike tonight's visual they too appeared randomly until a plane crossed this time from east to west and then the ufo's disappeared into the sky.  both locations are rural areas.  there is limited light at night (both locations) and the sky was clear, the moon was not visible. there were stars and a planet visible in the western sky though we could not see any in the area where we saw the ufo's.  the flashing lights on the ufo and the sudden sound of a plane shortly before the ufo's vanishment was eerie to say the least.  my granddaughter attempted to take pictures but failed to capture them although minutes later she readily filmed her cats.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: In southern sky (rural comanche county)

content.detailedDescription:
My family and i were on our way out the door to pick up our dinner. when we got out to my truck from my house which is located in ottawa,il a bright section of cloud cover caught my eye. when i looked up at it i noticed a dark gray oval shape in that section of cloud which was to the west of ottawa. i asked my wife what she thought it was. she thought it may just be a small dark cloud. upon further viewing, it became evident that it was not because it never moved and it had a weird shape. i decided to take pictures of it with my camera which is a nikon coolpix 7.1 mp. the first picture was with no zoom. the second and third picture was zoomed in about half way. we watched the object for about five more minutes or so. to the human eye it didn't really have much definition. we left to pick up dinner.
   a little more than a week passed before i reviewed the pictures that i took. when i loaded them on to my computer which is hooked up to a 47 inch hd tv, i was totally blown away by what i had captured! the camera picked up way more definition than my eyes. the first picture i took of the oval shape has a solid object in the center and to the right of it and slightly higher is a classic saucer shaped object! i'm 99.9% sure this was not visible to my eyes. i have included all three pictures totally untouched. what you see is what the camera saw. please contact me for any additional info that you may need.
content.summary: Grey oval shaped object in a bright section of cloud with a disc shape object to its right.

content.detailedDescription:
In fort worth, near i-30 and 820, looking toward the west at the sky, above a 5 or 6 story building, i saw what looked similar to a falling star. but, it was so much larger than a falling star. it was as close to earth as a plane would be. it only lasted for a couple of seconds. i just sat there staring at the sky, not believing what i saw. my friend asked me what i was looking at. i just looked at her with a strange look on my face. i was afraid to tell her. finally, i told her that i saw a large light flying through the sky. she said it was probably a ufo, that a lot of people had been seeing them lately.

if i had to say exactly what it was, i would say an object on fire flying through the sky. for a second i thought it might be a meteor. it was very bright, some blue, white and orange colored lights/fire.

i wasn't able to see it long, due to the height of the insurance bldg to the west of us. i wish i had. it's definitely got my curiousity.
content.summary: Huge falling star looking object

content.detailedDescription:
Dear ufo hunters, i was watching your program tonight and after seeing these 3 lights in a rotating fix manner it appeared that these so called light were scanning the earth or an aera of interest, why have 3 lights go in a random path, if they are smart enough to plan and exicute this type of display then i would assume they have a real motive, i would look into the idea that they may be scanning the earth with this slow turn fix type frame, maybe deep with in the earth, my first impression was a grid 1500x1500 would be big enough to cover a large area. i just thought you might like a new idea as to what they would want
what looks like random lights could very well be some kind of scanner of some kind, they have become more brazen in the last severe years as if they really dont care if there seen, i wish i had been there as i have a million candle spot light to pearse the knight with to see if this oject was a solid mass, was there any visible stars or lights from helicopter that past behind oject and was blacked out??They left running lights on and appear to have been in a stealth mode for main body, or sencors on it tips for navigation, just a thought i might send to ya all. again keep it up, soon very soon this ufo and uso will be in the open, everyong is watching, we need that daylight close up. mr dana cannon, sky watcher
content.summary: Comment on illinous sighting

content.detailedDescription: I was in my front yard takeing in the evening calm and clear sky i was looking up to see the faint few stars and air planes going by, by the way i've been liveing here for the last 30 years in the area and i've seen all kind of air traffic, from ultralights to the concord to the spaceshuttle re entry as i was checking out the skies my hose faces the south the objeck cought my eyes in the southwest i thought it was a star till it started getting brighter then i assumed airplane but all other planes in the area had stobes flashing even the ones that were far i could see the strobes when the object got even closer i ran inside called my wife and kids to come see this that way they could wittness the objecton the way back out i grabed my bonoculars wich are 10*50 power we all looked at it through them yet i could'nt compare it to any other air borne object that i've ever seen it seemed like it was higher than the planes comeing in for a landing yet lower than the one's approching the metroplex the object when over head didnot make a sound yet was traveling at what seem like the speed of a fighter jet at about 10 thousand feet plus or minus acouple hundred feet the object was so bright i still had a hard time makeing out what it looked like it was sphere to disk type with what seem like a space between top and bottom it traveld in a direct line twards the north east tere was no breeze that evening after it went over head i went inside to call a friend that lives to the north of the airport to sere if he could see any thing but he was a littl;e to late to see it because as it moved over head i realized it was trveling a lot faster than what i figured because it seem like it only took it a couple of minutes to disapear to the north east a couple of days later i mentioned it to my mom and she told me that she seen on a hispanic channel were thay mentioned that several people in the fort worth area called in with a report of an objectin the skys thats it thank you very much for letting me submit this sighting.
content.summary: On the 21'st of sep 2008 i saw a extreamly bright  light come directly overhead i could tell it was round but it was to bright  to determine what it really looked like.

content.detailedDescription: On the morning of the sighting we were in a rural area of indiana... my son and i were headed east in my vehicle on carrol road when i spotted a cylinder shape ufo looked like a fuselage of a plane(no wings) above the tree line about a mile away from us. it was huge! there was no sound! it looked very metalic... reflected the sun light.. standing still, no noise.  i turned the car around to get a better look... and it started to move slowly... and then it just disappeared! when i got home i called the indianapolis airport authority, fbi, mt comfort airport , indiana state police..... there had not been any other reports made. i still can not figure out what i saw.... but what ever it was it was real close to us and i felt very strange afterwards.
content.summary: My son and i saw a  huge cylinder shape ufo about amile away from us right above the tree line.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 4:00 pm pacific time on saturday, 10/18/08, my girlfriend and i saw an unidentifiable light phenomenon in the sky. we were at the grape st. dog park in south park, san diego letting our dog run around. we were relaxing in the northwestern most area in the park sitting in the grass and noticed that there were several large hawks flying around eying the dogs in the park. we have a small dog and there were several other small dogs in the vicinity so i was watching the hawks fly around when i noticed what looked like a star in the sky north of where we were. i thought at first it may have been a plane or a helicopter coming in, but the object was stationary and appeared to be changing its orientation as it sat there. i have no better way to describe it than to say that it looked like it was "flopping around" or "crawling" in place and the sun reflecting off of it was illuminating different aspects of it (keep in mind it was very small and far away). the grape street dog park is almost directly east of downtown and the airport (which is on the bay on the west side of downtown) and airplanes do circle around and then approach the airport from the east, so we thought that maybe it was just an airplane or helicopter approaching us which would explain why it appeared to be stationary, but within a few minutes, a plane came in and it became apparent that this object was very very far away in comparison to the size of the planes coming in and the object was much higher and further away and in a different location than anything else we saw (and stationary). we noticed after a few moments that there were now two light objects. the original object was the larger of these two and the smaller one appeared to split off from the larger one and do a circle around it before stopping at about the 4 o'clock position in relation to the large object. both objects then moved very slowly across the sky until they were obscured from our line of sight by a tree and seemed to be a little smaller once they were visible as if they were moving away from us. once they emerged from behind the tree and were visible again, the smaller object had moved to about the 8 o'clock position in relation to the larger one and then disappeared completely after a few moments. just for clarification, this thing was really small and looked like a star and the movement that was discernible at first was not now apparent and we were left watching a point of light that was very difficult to refocus on if you looked away. the movement had ceased at this point for a few minutes and the object was stationary. after a few moments, the light was indiscernible and i thought it had vanished. i moved closer to the center of the park which was east from our original location and was once again able to locate the object. i watched and filmed this object for quite a few minutes but it was not visible in my camera's viewfinder (digital still camera with video capability) so i was just pointing and praying something showed up, as the object was visible to the naked eye. i did get footage of the object after i moved locations, but it doesn't look like anything except a really bright small star in the middle of the day. this object moved too slowly to be a plane crossing the sky (at any distance)or shooting star, and much too quickly to be a star or planet. it moved and then stopped and stood still for a few moments twice in the period of time that we watched it which is not something that you would expect from a star or planet or shooting star. we had to leave the dog park soon after the object moved the second time but it was still just sitting in the same location not moving. i didn't really want to leave but i sincerely thought that it was not going to be visible on film as i couldn't see it through the viewfinder so i didn't really mind. i live about two miles north of the dog park in north park with no large trees around to obstruct your view and as soon as we got home around 4:45pm-5:00pm i scoured the sky for this object but it was no longer visible anywhere in the sky. i am attaching some of the footage that i shot of this object, but once again, there is nothing visible in most of it. i know someone else had to have seen these things in the middle of the day and i thought it prudent to report this in case i could corroborate someone else's claim. out of the six separate clips that i have, this thing is visible in only two that i am attaching. i am attaching the last video solely for the audio as it was taken almost as soon as we spotted the object and you can hear my girlfriend describe what she was seeing as well. the objects are not visible but you can hear us talking about what we were seeing as we are seeing it. i must apologize for the language on the last video and if you are easily offended just skip the last one- sorry! i must add that my girlfriend just graduated from ucsd with two degrees and that i am about to start attending ucsd next year- we are both college educated and have both seen our share of planes, helicopters, stars, shooting stars and planets.
content.summary: Bright star-like object(s) seen in sky while at south park san diego grape street dog park - 10/18/06

content.detailedDescription: This took place in bremerton, wa. i was delivering a pizza for my job. my destination was 11th st place. i was going from the store, which is on the east side, to my destination. while i was crossing the warren ave bridge i looked to my left and three lights up in the sky. about 9 o clock to me. they were very bright. brighter than stars. the lights were vertical with space between them, and it seemed like the outside lights were spreading further apart. since i was driving and couldnt stop on the bridge, they soon were out of sight for me. and at the time i thought it looked weird but thought that it could just be flares. so after i crossed the bridge they were out of sight for me. i realized that my pizza delivery destination was near the water, where i would be able to see it, if it was still there. when i was able to see it again, there was only one light. i got out of my car and moved to where i could see it best. from where i was standing it looked to be over the port orchard area, but it was difficult for me to tell distances. i stood and watched it for about 3 minutes. it was very bright. and was basically still, not moving, except for small movements in a kind of wobbley way. after about 3 minutes, the light slowly dimmed. then all of a sudden it started to move. it moved to my left, which would be to the east. as it moved it got dimmer and dimmer, and then started to blink like a plane. then it just looked like a plane at night moving to the east until it was out of my sight. as soon as it started to move i said "what?" out loud. after this whole thing happened, i delivered the pizza and had to hold back from telling the people i was delivering to. then i called my wife and told her and drove back to the store. crazy.
content.summary: I saw 3 lights while driving, then one light stand still for a couple minutes, then it started to move.

content.detailedDescription:
May 25, 2008 1:00 am
 	  i went to manhattan with my sister in law and her husband to see the indiana jones movie.  when we were on the long island expressway headed back to queens, about 1:00am; i looked up at the moon.  it was almost full but not quite.  it was bright.  there was a thick black line going almost all the way across the moon!!  hold up a cd and put a black pen in front of it, directly under the middle, that's how it looked!! at first i thought it was clouds covering it, but the edges of the line were straight and the line stayed perfectly straight for about five minutes.  it couldn't have been a satellite or space station because the line stretched almost all the way across the moon; way too large. it was directly in front of the moon and seemed to be closer to the moon than the earth.  when i first saw it, it was above the middle it gradually got lower and lower. after five minutes it was gone.  everybody in the car saw it, no one could figure out what it was.   

unfortunately, i did not have camera or camcorder with me. however, i drew this bizarre image as soon as i got home that night. i've included this picture as an attachment. 
this is perhaps one of the strangest things i have seen in my life. i would like to know what this can possibly be, and if others had similar sightings around that time.

thank you
content.summary: Moon was almost a full moon. i saw a solid straight black line infront of the moon, almost completely covered the entire width.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving on hwy 93, over the hill as it goes into st ignatius, i was looking toward the sky - northeasterly - as is my habit, looking at the morning star on my way to work. i noticed the star didn't seem to be in the same region i had observed it the morning before (oct 28th). the star seemed closer than it should be, yet i thought it was a star. so i was studying the stars a little more intently than usual. just as i had that thought, the large star swelled to a very large bright orangey/glow - bright enough to make me blink. i was startled, and watched it shrink back to the size of a large morning star size. i watched it's direction of flight as i drove on the highway on the same general path - northeast toward town. it didn't haven't the blinking flight lights like on a plane, it went faster than the planes i see but not so fast as to be unnatural. then it passed over the mission range. it wasn't close enough for details as to it's shape, but it was more oval than round, and it was high in the sky above the valley below.

the time was after 7:00am. i had just checked the time, to see if i had missed the morning news. this happened between 7:06 and 7:20 am.

it was confusing, because the light wasn't painfully bright, but the bright circle filled my windshield and my field of vision. it seemed to be above me, but yet far away. i felt confusion.
content.summary: A bright light in the sky that swelled a bright orangey color, shrunk to large star-size, and proceeded northeast over mountains.

content.detailedDescription:
Someone called my mother and told her to listen to the scanner because they had heard somone had reported "mysterious" lights in the sky.  so, my mother turned on the scanner as i went and found my video camera.  we didn't think much of it because it was close to the anniversary of 9/11 but wanted to check it out.

so, after listening to the scanner for a few seconds we went ahead and went outside to look for ourselves, and sure enough to the south of our house there was a strange bright light in the sky.  it looked at first like a fireball just kinda sitting in the air.  then it began to slowly dim until it wasn't really visible anymore.  then after a few seconds  three seperate lights apearred in the same general area.  it continued to stay in a triangle formation that seemed to be pretty exact for about a minute and a half. then after staying in that same shape the lights began to move independently of one another and move across the sky at varied speeds until they were no longer in sight.

our part of the encounter accounts for about 5 minutes or so however, the entire encounter from the time it was first seen and called in and then we were able to go outside and view it was probably at least 20 minutes or so.
content.summary: Heard report of lights over scanner and went outside to see and record three unkown lights.

content.detailedDescription: I could hear a slight hum, my hair stood up on my arms,  it slowly moved over my house and trees blocked view after that.  i could see a light haze glow on the bottom.  it was only about 200 feet above me and it was about 300 feet long.
content.summary: Triangle ufo 4 light over house

content.detailedDescription: I let my dog out at approx 7:45 pm. i noticed three bright stationary non-blinking lights to the east of our farm.  they were the color of a bright street light only a little more yellow. the lights were in a flattened  triangular shape and were stationary.  i went in the house and retrieved my 7x50 steiner binoculars. i observed the lights for the next 15 or 20 minutes. i could make out no physical detail in the lights. the lights then moved north slowly and seemed to spread out horizontally a little. the lights then went out either blocked by trees at the edge our fence or disappeared. i walked north to the driveway to see the area of the sky that the lights were moving toward but they did not reappear. instead i observed two sets of blinking type avation lights at fairly high altitude moving toward each other. one appeared higher than the other (one from the east one from the north-east. i watched them for a moment thinking to my self that they were pretty close together. all during this sighting, it was very quiet...No car motors, no sounds of planes or avaition motors. i later phoned my wife in comanche county and related the story. she said that about the time i was watching the lights, extremely loud booms were heard by herself and family.  i surmised that they were sonic booms because they rattled the windows and were "felt". the lights i saw were not lights on an aircraft.  they were too bright and too large.  they did not appear to be search lights of any kind i have ever seen. the lights were the wrong color to be high intensity type observation lights which are bright white. i believe that the towns of gorman or de leon are (as the crow flies)in the direction that i saw the lights. the lay of the land to the east is too flat for these lights to be on to the ground. i was not upset by this. mostly puzzled. i have been interested in the night sky and astronomy my whole life and i have never seen anything like this. this is a rural location and the closest neighbor is approx 1/2 mile to the south. my wife phoned me @ 5pm the next day saying she overheard someone talking in a cafe in comanche tx saying they had seen strange lights the same night.
content.summary: A triangle of bright stationary lights in the sky east of my location.

content.detailedDescription:
My friend sam is, for lack of a better term, a computer tard and every wednesday we get together to have dinner and catch up on the previous weeks events.

he brought over his digital camera and asked me if i could transfer his photos to a cd.  as we went through the pics, i noticed this photo (see attached) that had a strange object in it.  as i zoomed in the hair on the back of my neck stood up.  he had captured a ufo.  then he started to tell me about an abduction his mother and him had encountered some 25 years ago.  i have known sam for years and he has never spoken of such things until this photo.

the picture was taken on ft. lewis army base. he also has several other photos ( i will be posting here in the near future) that have ufos in them.
content.summary: Ufo near ft. lewis

content.detailedDescription: I saw the tinley park lights (3 lights) the second time around, then a few day later i saw only two lights slowly fly over head.  i could not see the stars in-between the lights.  it seemed big.  i have never reported this before because i don't know the exact date or time.  i am a smoker, and in trying to quit, i only smoked outside - and that is when i saw it.  the sighting was after the well known tinley lights i am now watching on tv.  i can't tell you how big the lights were across, or why i could only see two lights.  i do know that they were not flares on balloons or an airplane, chopper or other aircraft flying "insync" with each other.
content.summary: Red lights in sky

content.detailedDescription: This recent sighting ties into a sighting that my wife and i also had on 10/18/08, at about 10:30 p.M.That sighting is the most dramatic sighting that my wife and i have ever experienced.On 10/18/08 my wife and i were on our way back from up north about 35 min north bellevue on m66 when my notices a bright light in the sky and asked me to look.Proceeded to pull over to the side of the road.We sat silently for a minute, there was no traffic at all.As we studied the light, asked my wife to grab the video camera from the back seat.My wife couldnt find it so i proceeded to turn on my emergency flashers and get it myself.Once we got the camera out and on the object it started to move towards us freaking my wife and myself out because we had kids in the car and did not know what to expect with all this going on,i had yet to begin recording and as soon as i hit the record button the bright glistening light dimmed out like theater lighting and began to move away while only showing one solid red light and one flashing red light.The object flew across the road and away from us then back across again while still moving away.We captured about ten seconds of this then unable to find it with camera so we sat and watched the rest of the objects activity.Then tonight at about 7:34 p.M. a light with similar values is in the southern sky moving east to west.I recorded this object also for 5 mins.Disc is not formatted yet.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Glistening light moving

content.detailedDescription:
I moved into this area in 1983.  i noticed strange white lights in the night sky every night, since 1986.  in the early 90s i photographed these lights, and although with the naked eye they look like stars they look like large blobs of white light beaming; two ramps of blue green light; saucer shaped with dome and a small white round light.  some of these objects would hover then dart up into outer space at a very high rate of speed.  these type lights are less common.  i felt nothing unusual photographing the objects, as i never did filming them for around 2 years.  in 2003 i bought a camcorder, and filmed the objects at a culdesac nearby where i live.  they always showed at around 8:30 pm up unto 10:00 pm.  they appeared sometimes in groups of three; they hover silently for minutes at a time then slowly move on their way; some look like jupiter; some connect and disconnect from each other; some have an eye inside that surfaces for a short time looking around in a circular motion on the inside surface of the object then disappearing inside; some show a very fast black surface storm going over it that looks like carbon.  i was able to see these characteristics being that i have a digital zoom on my camera.  i was able to get right up to them.  sometimes the objects show at dusk.  i filmed a ufo, at the same place, that flared out from a dot of light 7 times.  and at around the time i stopped filming i turned around after filming, and i saw a big round white light 50 feet from me.  it was only about 20 feet altitude.  i said out loud, "what the hell is that?" as i started filming it i felt a strong telepathic presence all around me, except for the middle of my back.  somehow i was able to see into the ufo, and i saw three aliens in it.  one was a doctor, and the other two were workers.  i do not know how i knew that.  they were watching me in a small monitor, and the doctor said, "what is he doing?" then the object slowly lifted outward high into the sky then it stopped.  then the doctor said, "he's not doing anything." then the object moved on northward going behind some big trees.  the doctor alien's skin was darker than the workers, and his eyes were a little different than the workers.  the workers had grayish skin, and their eyes were egg shaped.  in the 25 years i lived here in garden grove i had 5 alien close encounters where 3 took place in my apartment.

england paranormal investigators thinks my film is amazing and fantastic.  they told me that i captured a lot of unusual and interesting things.  in fact having the largest paranormal website in england they wanted to make a hour cd out of my film.  i have 8 hours of footage, but i did not use a tripod.  however for some reason mufon does not care about my reports or at least does not contact me about any of them.  only in 1994 mufon of o.C. did 2 investigations with me on the lights that were at the time coming a lot.  they were coming in 2 at a time.  in 45 minutes we saw about 90 of them.  at the end of the 2nd investigation mufon covered up telling me that they were airplanes, and disneyland fireworks.  3 years later i spoke on the phone to ron rehger who was also a mufon investigator.  he told me that those lights are in mufon's records as "unknown" meaning ufo.  and peter davenport from the nuforc told me that none of the materials i sent him are alien related.  recently i offered him my 8 hours of footage on dvd free.  he did not even say thanks, but advised me to put it on the internet for others to see, and to see what they say.  and in the 80s i sent him my first 2 photos where the objects stopped under a lamplight.  he told me i sent him lamplights returning my photos.  you can clearly see the oval objects under the lamplight.  in fact i sent those 2 photos to the ufomrc in roswell, new mexico.  doctor burleson there analyzed them on a data base computer, and confirmed to me that they are round.  he sent me the data base printout that i still have.  and seti told me i filmed aircraft.  so i do not expect any attention for this or any report i make about the ufo/alien subject.  i am doing this because i am bored, and for personal reasons, so the subject might be better understood.
content.summary: Strange lights coming from unknown source every night since 1986

content.detailedDescription: We were southbound on hwy 95, 1 mile n. of cistern when we first spotted the ufo. we went to our driveway and sat by the cattleguard and notised it was getting brighter & pulsatting. we could see it thru the trees. we saw 2 faint blinking lights under the larger craft. we moved closer then a plane flew by. we moved again and saw other blinking ufo's , we decided to go to the house because it was getting closer .Then we saw another blinking light under the 2 smaller lights. we stopped and saw something fall from the sky from the  larger ufo or mothership(the top ufo). it was  a green tail light that lasted exactly 5 minutes.The bright ufo lite the sky up. later we both saw another object fall from the mothership with a green tail light fall to the ground. we decided to go inside beacuse we were scared!The am there were 3 black hawk helicopters checking out the area we saw the occurance.During the event the animals were bothered and it got really cold where we were.The sky looked like dawn just starting although that was a few hours away.
content.summary: Pulsating light with litle ones underneath

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on side of hwy 16 just north of possum kingdom lake.  earlier i had watched through binoculars three separate orange lights that appeared to be jets with landing lights on moving west from dfw.  as the jets switched to regular lights i was about to pull out of an dirt road and stopped to make sure no traffic was coming.  i happened to look south where the jets should of been and right at that moment three (one on left separated by maybe half a fist to two other objects on the right) bright orange lights appeared.  they were in the southern sky, maybe 20-25��� up from the ground.  put the binoculars on them immediately - i had a camera but i knew that i had no good chance since it is an older digital and does not do well in low light.  i watched both objects; on the right there were two dots - the dot on right would 'disappear' and then reappear to the left of the first dot.  it did that 2-3 times.  the other object on the left was a bigger dot, bigger than venus looks now in the sky.  as i watched it, another orange ball appeared to come out of the main object and move away just a little bit, and then another (i think) came 'out' of it as well.  i was freaked because i had finally seen something i had always watched for!  they did not move, just sat there and did what they did.  and then they just blinked out and were gone.  i stayed and watched a little more but that was it.

the previous report i had filed with mufon turned out to be a really big weather balloon.  this damned sure was no weather balloon or anything i have seen before.
content.summary: Two separate bright orange lights, single one on left turned into two-three separate objects

content.detailedDescription: Saw lights moving from a distance while outside our back porch. at first i thought they were flares as we live on a military instillation, however the direction is all wrong.  these were towards the direction of gatesville tx and not on post.  the lights seemed to be pulsing from from one side to the other, making it seem like the object was oval in shape.  the movement of the lights would go on blinking, then suddenly they would disappear and would appear seconds later in a different location.  at one point i saw sparkling lights moving, at first i thought it was a flare, but this was not going up and down, it was was diagonal.  these sighting happened in two occasions, only the sparkling lights happened once.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Flashing lights made seem oval /sphere in shape

content.detailedDescription:
Coral gables, fl, 10/28/08, 9:55 pm. 

taking a walk in the cool clear night before i went to bed. i am an amateur astronomer so i was looking at the clear night sky identifying constellations and stars. just before i went in i stepped into the middle of my street to get a good look to the east to see what constellations were rising, so i was looking for faint stars in the light glow of the city. i noticed a v formation of faint yellow/gold lights moving from north to south. there were no flashing or blinking lights and no non-yellow lights, just steady faint yellow lights in a v formation. there were approx four to five lights in each leg of the v, possibly nine or ten in total. it gave the impression of being distant, high, or far away. there was no sound associated with the lights. at one point the v formation suddenly became sloppy with the lights going out of alignment into a very rough formation and then suddenly and quickly they came back into a perfect v. this quick movement out of and back into a v was odd looking, it did not seem like "normal" movement. i lost sight of the v formation as it moved behind a tall building. this all there is to say, nothing more to add.
content.summary: V formation of yellow lights
